Write-Up Text: The Australian federal budget has sparked a lot of conversation among people on social media. Some are worried about the government's handling of vaping while others are optimistic about the government's plans to boost healthcare spending. There are debates about the budget's impact on household savings and tax cuts. In addition a panel of experts is scheduled to discuss the budget's nuances and impact on businesses. Overall the tone from the online community seems to be a mix of apprehension excitement and dissent.
